application.model

类 GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to manage the whole game. It provides three methods. They will be called when life lost/ game end/ game win.
    作者:
    Xinyi OUYANG / 20030865

    • 字段概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      GameManager(javafx.scene.Group root, application.model.Maze maze)
      Constructor. instantiate the classes which will be used when initialize the game and run the game such as class Generate, MovePac..

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void endGame()
      Ends the game, turn down the music, hide the current stage and show the score board page.
      void lifeLost()
      Set one life less.
      void winGame()
      Ends the game if the pacman has eaten all cookies.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameManager

        public GameManager(javafx.scene.Group root,
                   application.model.Maze maze)
        Constructor. instantiate the classes which will be used when initialize the game and run the game such as class Generate, MovePac..
        参数:
        root - - the group of the elements that will be shown on the stage.
        maze - - the game maze.

    • 方法详细资料

      • lifeLost

        public void lifeLost()
        Set one life less. Stop the pacman and ghosts. Set the pacman to the origin location. If life equals to zero, game ended.

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        Ends the game, turn down the music, hide the current stage and show the score board page.

      • winGame

        public void winGame()
        Ends the game if the pacman has eaten all cookies.
